scripts.postinstall: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd dashboard && yarn install && cd functions && yarn install && yarn run handle-config
scripts.dev: concurrently --names website,firebase,config "yarn run next-dev" "cd dashboard && yarn run emulators" "yarn run watch-config"
scripts.build: yarn run dump-code-version && yarn run handle-config && next build && next export -o build
scripts.deploy: yarn run handle-config && yarn run deploy-rewrites && yarn run build && yarn run deploy-only
scripts.deploy-all: cd dashboard && yarn run deploy-all && cd .. && yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy-rewrites: if ! node ./scripts/rewrites-deployed.js; then mkdir -p build && yarn run deploy-only; fi
scripts.next-dev: yarn run wait-for-emulators && yarn run handle-config && yarn run dump-code-version && NODE_ENV='development' node ./scripts/server.js
